'''Seeker of Flame-Wrought Secrets''' is a [[Character Event Wish]] with the 5 Star [[Character]] "Turnfire Hunt" [[Kinich]] ({{Dendro}}) as the promoted character with an increased chance to be obtained.

{{Wish History Table}}

==Trivia==
* The first occurrence of this Wish Series ran alongside an [[Epitome Invocation]] Wish featuring [[Fang of the Mountain King]], a weapon tailored to Kinich's gameplay mechanics.
